name: contrast-widget
description: Bookmarklet to analyse the contrast of test elements in a document

scripts.build:js: mkdir -p build && rollup -c && babel --presets es2015 ./build/bundle.es2015.js | uglifyjs -m --screw-ie8 > ./build/bundle.min.js && wc -c ./build/bundle.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:html
